entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:50 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 09:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: WSW 47 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 40 km/h becoming southwest 70 gusting to 110 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 110 diminishing to 50 gusting to 90 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 08:26 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
